name: 18782 Demo (Saturngames)
description:
18782 Demo!

Storyline: 
Arakawa is an 18 year old boy who’s absolutely obsessed with an up-and-coming visual kei vocalist named Yukio. Recently, Yukio has put out a new album, “Pink Film”, and is planning on doing a meet and greet. Needless to say, Arakawa is psyched to attend. The game chronicles the week leading up to the meet-and-greet.

This demo should take approx 15-20 minutes!

Please check the README file for important information regarding the game/where to send bug reports/making sure your keys are mapped correctly!!!!

Mac Users: I'm a PC user myself so I can't test these things, but if you want to play try this method.

Story,Coding,Characters,Music,ectectectect all done by me
Special thanks to my pre-demo release playtesters: Naomi, Vee and Gray!!!
